msContents.summary: A Karaim translation of the Torah and the Haftarah

ab.l: And it was in the days of Amraphel, king of Shinar, Arioch,king of Ellasar, Chedorlaomer, king of Elam, and Tidal,king of Goiim:
These kings made war with Bera, king of Sodom, andwith Birsha, king of Gomorrah, with Shinab, king of Admah, andShemeber, king of Zeboiim, and the king of Bela, that is,Zoar.
All these gathered in the Valley of Siddim,that is the salt sea.
Twelve years they servedChedorlaomer, and in the thirteenth year they rebelled.
And in the fourteenth year came Chedorlaomer, and the kings thatwere with him, and smote the Rephaim in Ashteroth-Karnaim,and the Zuzim in Ham, and the Emim in Shaveh--Kiriathaim.
And the Horites in the mountainsof Seir as far as the plain El-Paran, which is by the wilderness.
And they returned and came to Enmishpat, that is Kadesh, and smoteall the people of the plain of the Amalekites and also theAmorites who were dwelling in Hazazon-Tamar.

Andthere went out the king of Sodom, and the king of Gomorrah, and the king of Admah, andthe king of Zeboiim, and the king of Bela, that is, Zoar, and they lined upwith them in |one| army in the Valley of Siddim.
With Chedorlaomer, king of Elam, and with Tidal, king of Goiim,and Amraphel, king of Shinar, and Arioch, king ofEllasar; four kings with five.
And the Valleyof Siddim was full of clay wells, and the kings of Sodomand Gomorrah fled, and fell there to be safe, and those who remainedfled toward the mountain.
And they took all the goods of Sodomand Gomorrah, and all their food, and they went.
And they took Lot, and his goods, the sonof Abram’s brother, and they went. And he had been living in Sodom.
And an escapee came and told Abramthe Hebrew, and he was living on the plains of Mamrethe Amorite, brother of Eshcol, and brother of Aner;and they were covenant partners of Abram.
AndAbram heard that his kinsman had been taken captive, and he armedhis trained men, born in his house, three hundred and eighteen,and went in pursuit as far as Dan.
And he divided his forces against them,by night, he and his servants, and smote them, and pursuedthem to the place called Hobah, which is at the left of Damascus.
And he took back all the goods, andalso his brother Lot, and his goods, he tookback the women also, and the people.
And the king of Sodom went out to meet him after his returnfrom beating Chedorlaomer, and the kingsthat were with him, at the Valley of Shaveh. That is, the King’s Valley.
And Melchizedek, king of Salem, brought forth bread andwine. And he was the priest of the |most| high God before them.
Andhe blessed him, and said, ‘Blessed be Abram before the |most| highGod, creator of heaven and earth.
Andpraised is the |most| high God, who has donated your enemies to your hand.’And Abram gave him a tithe from everything.
AndAnd the king of Sodom said to Abram, ‘Give the souls to me, andtake the goods for yourself.’
And Abram said to the kingof Sodom, ‘I have raised my hand with an oath to the Lord,the |most| high God, the creator of heaven and earth:
seg type="commented" n="#seg004"/I will not takeanchor type="commented" xml:id="seg004"/ a thread or a sandal strap from allthat is yours, and you should not say, “I have made Abram rich.”
Except only that which the servants have eaten,and the portion of the men who went with me, Aner,Eshcol, and Mamre: let them take their portion.’
